title: Awarding of smart meters by discoms to rise in near to medium term: Icra
description: The smart metering installations are likely to surge over the next two years supported by the progress in tendering, the agency said in a report on Wednesday. "Icra anticipates the awarding of smart meters by state distribution utilities (discoms) to increase to 222 million over the near to medium term from 99 million so far," it said.
